translated: The Chapter on the Interior🔽The Interior Tree Jātaka
“There is a tree called the interior,
Having eaten it, a woman with a swollen belly
gives birth to a universal monarch.
You too, blessed one, are a great queen,
and she is dear to her husband;
this fruit of the interior tree.”
The hero who gives himself up,
having obtained it, I will be.”
The Interior Tree Jātaka, the first.
